name: Link's Day Off
description:
Devlog: 

How to Play:

Arrow Keys or WASD for movement.

Press Save/Load button to save/load the player position. 

Walk in grass to trigger battle system. 

Credits: 

Miko Man 101127881: Game Manager, Encounter System, Ability System, Encounter AI

Shun min Hsieh 101212629: Game Assets, Game UI, Animation, Map, Music Manager, Save/Load Function
